nodes.text: The Orroman system was a Wild Space star system that contained the astronomical object Orroman. At some point, a group of mercenaries caused a water crisis on Orroman, and the information about the disaster eventually became general knowledge across the galaxy.
The Orroman system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square I-14.
